name: The Wish Tree
description:
A gift to my fans/friends/collectors at the end of 2021. I wish you a fruitful 2022. I hope my art brought you a bit of joy, curiosity, awe, or a couple tez. 
This piece is made from a scan of a "Wishing Tree" in Miami Florida. The Banyan Tree is covered in a few thousand ribbons, each with someone's wish. 1080x1080mov, December 2021
